text: Mac Studio is updated with a new chip
full-pick-text: Mac Studio is updated with a new chip
notes: • The first ever bonus pick, thanks to a pick coming true after it was graded false. Before the hosts remembered that bonus picks were a thing now, this was a Flexie.

text: MacBook Pro is refreshed with a new chip
full-pick-text: MacBook Pro is refreshed with a new chip
notes: • There is some question as to whether a pick from 3 games ago includes the 2025 game that was graded moments ago, and it is decided that it does. Now that ahead of their time picks grant bonus picks, this throwback from 2023 can now be used.
